org.yamcs.http.api

Class RestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.http.RouteHandler
      • org.yamcs.http.api.RestHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveAlarmRestHandler, ArchiveCommandRestHandler, ArchiveDownloadRestHandler, ArchiveEventRestHandler, ArchiveIndexDownloadsRestHandler, ArchiveIndexRestHandler, ArchivePacketRestHandler, ArchiveParameterReplayRestHandler, ArchiveParameterRestHandler, ArchiveSqlRestHandler, ArchiveStreamRestHandler, ArchiveTableRestHandler, ArchiveTagRestHandler, BucketRestHandler, CcsdsTmIndex.CcsdsTmIndexRestHandler, CfdpRestHandler, ClientRestHandler, InstanceRestHandler, LinkRestHandler, MDBAlgorithmRestHandler, MDBCommandRestHandler, MDBContainerRestHandler, MDBParameterRestHandler, MDBParameterTypeRestHandler, MDBRestHandler, MDBSpaceSystemRestHandler, ParameterArchiveMaintenanceRestHandler, ProcessorCommandQueueRestHandler, ProcessorCommandRestHandler, ProcessorParameterRestHandler, ProcessorRestHandler, RocksDbMaintenanceRestHandler, ServiceRestHandler, SimulationTimeService.SimTimeRestHandler, TemplateRestHandler, UserRestHandler

    public abstract class RestHandler
extends RouteHandler
    Contains utility methods for REST handlers. May eventually refactor this out.
